I just found a book called 'The Uesugi' Samurai Heroes 2 written by Martin Jones and Terje Solum published by Dai Sho Publishing (London) 1995. Its a short work on Uesugi Kenshin. The writer also penned a book on Takeda Shingen (Samurai Heroes 1?) and was going to write one on II Naomasa. Does anyone have any info on these books and the writer, especially where I can find these books. Thanks
